The word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came again unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, set<S>7760</S> thy face<S>6440</S> against the Ammonites<S>1121</S> <S>5983</S>, and prophesy<S>5012</S> against them;
And say<S>559</S> unto the Ammonites<S>1121</S> <S>5983</S>, Hear<S>8085</S> the word<S>1697</S> of the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because thou saidst<S>559</S>, Aha<S>1889</S>, against my sanctuary<S>4720</S>, when it was profaned<S>2490</S>; and against the land<S>127</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, when it was desolate<S>8074</S>; and against the house<S>1004</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, when they went<S>1980</S> into captivity<S>1473</S>;
Behold, therefore I will deliver<S>5414</S> thee to the men<S>1121</S> of the east<S>6924</S> for a possession<S>4181</S>, and they shall set<S>3427</S> their palaces<S>2918</S> in thee, and make<S>5414</S> their dwellings<S>4908</S> in thee: they shall eat<S>398</S> thy fruit<S>6529</S>, and they shall drink<S>8354</S> thy milk<S>2461</S>. <sup>men: Heb. children</sup>
And I will make<S>5414</S> Rabbah<S>7237</S> a stable<S>5116</S> for camels<S>1581</S>, and the Ammonites<S>1121</S> <S>5983</S> a couchingplace<S>4769</S> for flocks<S>6629</S>: and ye shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
For thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because thou hast clapped<S>4222</S> thine hands<S>3027</S>, and stamped<S>7554</S> with the feet<S>7272</S>, and rejoiced<S>8055</S> in heart<S>5315</S> with all thy despite<S>7589</S> against the land<S>127</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; <sup>hands: Heb. hand</sup> <sup>feet: Heb. foot</sup> <sup>heart: Heb. soul</sup>
Behold, therefore I will stretch out<S>5186</S> mine hand<S>3027</S> upon thee, and will deliver<S>5414</S> thee for a spoil<S>957</S> <S>897</S> to the heathen<S>1471</S>; and I will cut thee off<S>3772</S> from the people<S>5971</S>, and I will cause thee to perish<S>6</S> out of the countries<S>776</S>: I will destroy<S>8045</S> thee; and thou shalt know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>a spoil: or, meat</sup>
Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because<S>3282</S> that Moab<S>4124</S> and Seir<S>8165</S> do say<S>559</S>, Behold, the house<S>1004</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> is like unto all the heathen<S>1471</S>;
Therefore, behold, I will open<S>6605</S> the side<S>3802</S> of Moab<S>4124</S> from the cities<S>5892</S>, from his cities<S>5892</S> which are on his frontiers<S>7097</S>, the glory<S>6643</S> of the country<S>776</S>, Bethjeshimoth<S>1020</S>, Baalmeon<S>1186</S>, and Kiriathaim<S>7156</S>, <sup>side: Heb. shoulder of Moab</sup>
Unto the men<S>1121</S> of the east<S>6924</S> with the Ammonites<S>1121</S> <S>5983</S>, and will give<S>5414</S> them in possession<S>4181</S>, that the Ammonites<S>1121</S> <S>5983</S> may not be remembered<S>2142</S> among the nations<S>1471</S>. <sup>with: or, against the children of Ammon</sup>
And I will execute<S>6213</S> judgments<S>8201</S> upon Moab<S>4124</S>; and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because that Edom<S>123</S> hath dealt<S>6213</S> against the house<S>1004</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> by taking<S>5358</S> vengeance<S>5359</S>, and hath greatly<S>816</S> offended<S>816</S>, and revenged<S>5358</S> himself upon them; <sup>by: Heb. by revenging revengement</sup>
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; I will also stretch out<S>5186</S> mine hand<S>3027</S> upon Edom<S>123</S>, and will cut off<S>3772</S> man<S>120</S> and beast<S>929</S> from it; and I will make<S>5414</S> it desolate<S>2723</S> from Teman<S>8487</S>; and they of Dedan<S>1719</S> shall fall<S>5307</S> by the sword<S>2719</S>. <sup>they: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan</sup>
And I will lay<S>5414</S> my vengeance<S>5360</S> upon Edom<S>123</S> by the hand<S>3027</S> of my people<S>5971</S> Israel<S>3478</S>: and they shall do<S>6213</S> in Edom<S>123</S> according to mine anger<S>639</S> and according to my fury<S>2534</S>; and they shall know<S>3045</S> my vengeance<S>5360</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because the Philistines<S>6430</S> have dealt<S>6213</S> by revenge<S>5360</S>, and have taken<S>5358</S> vengeance<S>5359</S> with a despiteful<S>7589</S> heart<S>5315</S>, to destroy<S>4889</S> it for the old<S>5769</S> hatred<S>342</S>; <sup>for the: or, with perpetual hatred</sup>
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Behold, I will stretch out<S>5186</S> mine hand<S>3027</S> upon the Philistines<S>6430</S>, and I will cut off<S>3772</S> the Cherethims<S>3774</S>, and destroy<S>6</S> the remnant<S>7611</S> of the sea<S>3220</S> coast<S>2348</S>. <sup>sea coast: or, haven of the sea</sup>
And I will execute<S>6213</S> great<S>1419</S> vengeance<S>5360</S> upon them with furious<S>2534</S> rebukes<S>8433</S>; and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>, when I shall lay<S>5414</S> my vengeance<S>5360</S> upon them. <sup>great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances</sup>
